description: Sometimes the wait between the Next Door photo shoot and the actual scene can take a while.  As Marcus Mojo and Tony Newport take a little breather, things heat up when Tony mentions how horny the shoot made him.  But he's not the only one!Marcus is stoked to shoot with a super hot dude like Tony.  They can hardly wait to get naked together, but the camera man is lagging today.  When Marcus gets the idea to warm up for the scene by shooting a little video with his own handy cam, things get wild quick!  Tony can't get out of his pants fast enough.  Soon Marcus's big, hard cock is sliding into Tony's eager mouth as these two turn up the heat.  And once they get going, there's no cooling off.  Watch Marcus and Tony have some preemptive fun before the camera guy even arrives!    Enjoy!
title: Can't Hardly Wait
